title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama CLI tool to pull and run Llama 3, Mistral, Gemma, and other large language models locally with GPU/CPU acceleration.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client library for Ollama; chat, generate, embed, pull, list and delete models with a few lines of code.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Node and browsers; same generate/chat/embed API surface as the Python library.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package that wraps Ollama endpoints as LLM, chat and embedding components.

title: ollama-webui
summary: ChatGPT-style web UI for Ollama models; supports multi-model chats, code highlighting, markdown, RAG via document uploads.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama with fluent builders, async calls and Spring Boot starter.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Lightweight RAG template using Ollama embeddings + Chroma vector DB; ingest PDFs and chat over them.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that turns any Ollama model into an inline code copilot with explain, refactor and test generation commands.

title: ollama-chat
summary: Next.js chat interface with TailwindCSS; stores threads in localStorage and supports image inputs via llava.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Production-ready Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU node selection and PVC model cache.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Rust-based CLI that wraps Ollama REST API with fuzzy model finder, conversation history and shell piping.

title: ollama-gui
summary: Lightweight Tauri desktop app for chatting with Ollama models; ships as a 5 MB signed binary for macOS/Windows/Linux.

title: ollama-docker-compose
summary: Official Docker Compose examples for CPU-only and NVIDIA GPU setups plus AMD ROCm variant.

title: ollama-models
summary: Community-curated Modelfile recipes for CodeLlama, Llama-3-70B-Instruct, WizardMath, SQLCoder, etc.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Async Rust crate that exposes generate, chat and embed endpoints with tokio and serde.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: .NET 8 client library with dependency injection helpers and Blazor chat demo.

title: ollama-django
summary: Django app with REST endpoints that proxy Ollama calls, adds JWT auth and per-user rate limits.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin that lets you summarize notes, generate flashcards and ask questions using any local Ollama model.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Self-hostable Discord bot that brings Ollama models into any server with slash commands and thread support.

title: ollama-slack
summary: Slack Bolt app that listens for mentions and DMs, streams Ollama responses back into threads.
